changelog: HOTFIX: Process Extraction Algorithm — Added a specialized algorithm to automatically identify game process names. This significantly improves stability when launching apps via external launchers without a manually defined process name.
HOTFIX: Profile Creation — Fixed an issue where the sequence duration timer would fail to reset when creating a new profile immediately after viewing an existing one.
HOTFIX: Tooltip Update — Refined the 'Monitor Process' hint in application settings to provide clearer guidance and information.
